landing.title: FitFast
landing.subtitle: AI-Powered Fitness Coaching
landing.heroTitle: Transform Your Body with Expert Coaching
landing.heroSubtitle: Personalized meal plans, smart workout programs, and direct coach support — all powered by AI, built for you.
landing.featuresSubtitle: A complete coaching experience designed for real results.
landing.feature1Desc: Your meal and workout plans are generated by AI based on your goals, health history, and preferences — updated every check-in cycle.
landing.feature2Desc: Track your weight, photos, fitness, and dietary adherence on a coach-defined schedule. Progress is always visible.
landing.feature3Desc: Have a question or concern? Open a ticket and your coach will respond. No bots, no automated replies.
landing.trustSubtitle: Built for the MENA region with Arabic-first design and local payment options.
landing.pricingSubtitle: Choose the plan that fits your goals. All plans include full coaching access.
landing.plansComing: Pricing plans coming soon. Check back shortly.
